name: Burlington Group
tag_list: bailiffs, high-court-enforcement, debt-collection, debt-recovery, car-repossession, residential-evictions, judgment-enforcement
overview:
Burlington Group delivers industry leading asset recovery, civil enforcement and arrears management solutions to banks and finance providers across the UK and Ireland.

The company has established itself as one of the UK’s leading vehicle repossession agencies. We are a specialist provider of contract services to some of Europe’s largest banks and motor finance providers.

We look at client needs from fresh perspectives to develop new ideas, allowing us to provide best-in-class credit management solutions and product unsurpassed results.

Why choose Burlington?

  • Best-in-class asset recovery providers
  • Arrears management solutions
  • 24 hour response nationwide
  • Same day asset recovery specialists
  • Trained head office personnel
  • Uniformed Certificated Bailiffs
  • Over 40 years industry experience

Specialities Secured Asset Repossessions, High Court Enforcement, Certificated Bailiff Enforcement, Credit Management, Debt Recovery, Evictions
